articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: NTSB Identifies Faults in Texas Near-Collision; Menendez Trial Highlights 'Gross' Meetings and More
articles.description: The NTSB discovered that incorrect assumptions by an air traffic controller nearly caused a FedEx and Southwest Airlines collision in Texas. In other news, former New Jersey attorney general Gurbir Grewal testified against Senator Bob Menendez in his corruption trial. Also covered are key cases involving Biden's border policies, Trump's fundraiser, and more.
articles.content:
Following is a summary of current US domestic news briefs.
NTSB finds incorrect assumptions by controller in Texas near air collision

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump Proposes Tariffs to Curb Undocumented Immigration
articles.description: Donald Trump suggests imposing tariffs on countries, including China, that fail to curb undocumented immigrants entering the U.S. if elected. Speaking in Arizona, Trump highlighted his tough stance on immigration, criticized Biden’s border policies, and promised significant action on his first day in office if re-elected.

articles.content:

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Steve Bannon Ordered to Prison July 1: Legal Battles Continue
articles.description: Steve Bannon, a close ally of Donald Trump, must report to prison by July 1 to serve a four-month sentence for defying a subpoena related to the Capitol insurrection investigation. Despite plans to appeal further, a federal judge declared that the original basis for delaying his prison term no longer exists.
articles.content: Steve Bannon, a longtime ally of former President Donald Trump, must report to prison by July 1 to serve his four-month sentence for defying a subpoena from the House committee investigating the U.S. Capitol insurrection, a federal judge ruled Thursd... [1478 chars]
